Archival Checklist:
- [ ] Get LogDNA server logs from S3
- [ ] Back up of application source code
- [ ] Back up of server software code
- [ ] Research to back up data processing code
- [ ] Back up of production database
- [ ] Audit Logs
- [ ] Collect relevant screenshots
- [ ] Upload all to Box
